room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
room_description: You are part of an archaeological team that has been sent on a mission to find a secret passage in one of Egypt’s largest and oldest pyramids. Known as Ammon’s Secret Passage, it is said to lead to the tomb of the beautiful Queen Rose and is filled with riches beyond compare. Just as your group discovers the entrance, a trap door locks you inside and toxic gasses begin to fill the tomb. The clock is ticking. You must use your tools to solve the clues and puzzles that lead to the tomb’s exit, fame and fortune.
